sentences.sentence: Because we have objectified animals, we are able to treat them impersonally.

sentences.sentence: The tenet is to service our clients fairly, equally, impersonally and reasonably.

sentences.sentence: With fashion's embed on finance and tax system, exchequer sustain is required impersonally.
